entry.title: Current Conditions: 9.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Gonzales 2:00 PM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Temperature: 9.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 74 %
Dewpoint: 5.1°C
Wind: WSW 33 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind west 30 km/h except gusting to 70 near Juan de Fuca Strait. High 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind west 30 km/h except gusting to 70 near Juan de Fuca Strait this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon except gusting to 50 near Haro Strait. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023
